product_name: DERMA EVitamin C Whipped Radiance Polish
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackPerk up dull skin in minutes! DERMA Eâ€™s Vitamin C Whipped Radiance Polish blends Stabilized Vitamin C with dual-exfoliating Volcanic Ash and Lactic Acid to gently smooth and revive dullness. Start your morning on a bright note with an energizing citrus scent and delightfully whipped texture!
details: DetailsBenefitsGently smooths texture and boosts brightnessRevives dullness and enhances radianceDelightfully whipped texture with an energizing scentLeaves skin feeling smooth and refreshedKey IngredientsStabilized Vitamin C: Visibly brightensVolcanic Ash: Gently exfoliates to smooth textureLactic Acid: Revives dullness for a radiant glowRaspberry Seed Oil: Nourishes and supports a healthy skin barrierItem 2640140How To UseUse a quarter-sized amount. Apply to damp skin and gently massage for 30 seconds. Rinse and pat dry. Use 2--3 times per week. Pair with DERMA E's Vitamin C Foaming Oil Cleanser to create the ultimate AM duo that energizes and revives.IngredientsPurified Water, Alumina, Stearyl Alcohol, Stearic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Glycerin, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Natural Fragrance Oil, Withania Somnifera Root Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Potassium Sorbate, Carrageenan, Kaolin, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Sodium Hydroxide, Pumice, Magnesium Oxide, Sea Salt, Lactic Acid, Calcium Aluminum Borosilcate, Silica, Titanium Dioxide, Tin Oxide, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Use a quarter-sized amount. Apply to damp skin and gently massage for 30 seconds. Rinse and pat dry. Use 2--3 times per week. Pair with DERMA E's Vitamin C Foaming Oil Cleanser to create the ultimate AM duo that energizes and revives.

reviews.headline: returned after one use
reviews.comments: i love the vitamin c cleansing paste that can also be used as a mask. this does not compare despite ingredients to the contrary. its a big "skip it" from me. granuals are too big and may cause micro-tears, thr amount of vitamin c in this isnt comperable to the paste.

reviews.headline: nope
reviews.comments: The granules are rather large and were rough on the face. I was only able to use it once so have no opinion on the efficacy. I returned the product.

faceoff_positive.comments: My skin has become more sensitive over the last few years so I usually stay away from exfoliants, but the whipped polish effectively exfoliated my skin and works nicely to provide that extra "deep cleaning" without feeling harsh/abrasive or drying.  I had a little breakout around my chin & jaw the next morning, but will need to try the polish a few more times to see if it had to do with the actual product or it was just my skin's initial shock/reaction to an exfoliant.
faceoff_positive.headline: Gentle, but effective

faceoff_negative.comments: Really liked the results from this, but it has so much exfoliant it took me a long time to rinse it all off. I still found exfoliant on my skin the next morning. But worked really well! Just best for "everything showers" when you can get your hair wet too as you remove all the exfoliant! I liked the color and the package, though. I will still use this but only in the shower and not at my sink.
faceoff_negative.headline: Great exfoliator, perhaps too good
